required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Videogame-based Tool for Job Search and Executive Function Improvement in Adults With ASD
clinical_study.official_title: Assessing Videogame-Based Tool for Job Search and Executive Function Improvement in Adults With Autism Spectrum Disorder

brief_summary.textblock: This study aims to assess the efficacy of Identifor, a strength- based, person-centered, vocational assessment tool to develop a more effective way to identify individual abilities, skills, and interests. Identifor uses computer games specifically designed for young adults with ASD.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Randomization into two groups A and B. Group Intervention or group A will comprise of participants who will be given usual referrals to pre-employment training, and will not use Identifor or Companion app. Intervention or group B will comprise of participants who were randomly selected to use Identifor and Companion app, in addition to referrals to pre-employment training.

primary_outcome.measure: Rate of securing internship, part-time, or full-time positions
primary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants securing internship, part-time, or full-time positions

The level of participant satisfaction will be determined from a Likert scale ("Very satisfied", "Somewhat satisfied", "Neither satisfied nor dissatisfied", "Somewhat dissatisfied", and "Very dissatisfied").

secondary_outcome.measure: Behavior Rating Inventory of Executive Function for Adults (BRIEF-A)
secondary_outcome.description: measure of executive function for adults

arm_group.arm_group_label: Use of Identifor and Companion+referral to employment agencies
arm_group.description: This group will use the Identifor tool and Companion app for a period of 6 months. They will also receive standard referral to employment agencies.
This group will not use the Identifor tool and Companion app. They will only receive standard referral to employment agencies.

intervention.intervention_name: Use of Identifor assessment tool and Companion app
intervention.description: Identifor pinpoints what players excel at by using objective metrics and quantifiable data to collect information relevant to employment, including Multiple Intelligence, Executive Function, and personality themes. Companion is a 24/7 personalized aide for teens and adults iwth special needs that uses and artificial intelligence avatar to have back-and-forth conversations with users in a meaningful way to support the user in different domains of their everyday lives including public transit, managing personal schedules, and money management.
intervention.arm_group_label: Use of Identifor and Companion+referral to employment agencies

intervention.description: Standard referral to employment agencies based on an individual's background, skillset, and preferences
intervention.arm_group_label: Use of Identifor and Companion+referral to employment agencies

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- IQ above 60
- Diagnosis of ASD as confirmed by qualified clinician (including Dr. Fung), and if necessary the administration of Autism Diagnostic Interview-Revised (ADI-R) and/or Autism Diagnostic Observation Schedule-Generic (ADOS-G)
- Age 18 to 55
- Adults who are physically healthy
- able to travel to work independently
Exclusion Criteria:
- DSM-5 diagnosis of other severe psychiatric disorder such as schizophrenia
